metadata.synopsis: One-liner for Fist Gonfalon, the human Flaming Fist at the bottom of the Guard Tower nearby Cazador's palace.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the human flaming fist nearby the Guard Tower near Cazador's palace

0.speaker: Fist Gonfalon
0.text: Move along, citizen. Nothing to see here.

1.speaker: Fist Gonfalon
1.text: Well, if it isn't Bad Reputation in the flesh. You're lucky I'm in no mood to give you what you deserve.

2.speaker: Fist Gonfalon
2.text: You're a hero of the city, right? Why don't you climb those stairs and see if the Absolute's army is at the gates?
